summary.para: Specifies the lower portion of the brightness transfer curve for the brightness effect.

param.name: blackPoint
param.para: Type: const

The lower portion of the brightness transfer curve. The black point adjusts the appearance of the darker portions of the image. The vector is for both the x value and the y value, in that order. Each of the values must be between 0 and 1, inclusive.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the x value of the black point.

param.name: blackPointX
param.para: Type: float
The x value of the black point.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the x value of the black point.

param.name: animation
param.para: Type: *
An animation that represents how the x value of the black point changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the y value of the black point.

param.name: blackPointY
param.para: Type: float
The y value of the black point.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the y value of the black point.

param.name: animation
param.para: Type: *
An animation that represents how the y value of the black point changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the upper portion of the brightness transfer curve.

param.name: whitePoint
param.para: Type: const

The upper portion of the brightness transfer curve. The white point adjusts the appearance of the brighter portions of the image. This vector is for both the x value and the y value, in that order. Each of the values must be between 0 and 1, inclusive.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the x value of the white point.

param.name: whitePointX
param.para: Type: float
The x value of the white point. This value must be between 0 and 1.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the x value of the white point.

param.name: animation
param.para: Type: *
An animation that represents how the x value of the white point changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the y value of the white point.

param.name: whitePointY
param.para: Type: float
The y value of the white point.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the y value of the white point.

param.name: animation
param.para: Type: *
An animation that represents how the y value of the white point changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The brightness effect controls the brightness of the image.
